Prepare a runner card: format with the given 12-hexadigit encryption key, assign ID (0..65535).
Clear previous punches from a card without changing card information (like ID).
Punch runner card with the given station ID (0..255) and current time.\nStation ID 0 is used for clock calibration, 10 for start, 255 for finish.
Read out a runner card, display the punches and optionally upload to QuickEvent using qr-o-punch protocol.\nClock offsets from "Read service card" will be applied to adjust station clock readings.
Reset a card by restoring the default encryption keys.\nThis will allow formatting it for another competition.
Create a service card for station configuration.\nA service card will allow writing an encryption key to the Arduino station.\nAs well as synchronizing Arduino clock.
